snippet.title: Pangeon - Xbox Trailer
snippet.description:
Pangeon coming soon to Xbox One. The retro roguelike will also hit PS4.

Available for Xbox on November 4, 2020:
https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/pangeon/9nl3nnjn8k9z

Pangeon is also available on:
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/pangeon-switch/
Steam (PC): https://store.steampowered.com/app/983670/Pangeon/
